entry.title: Falling For Oklch: A Love Story Of Color Spaces, Gamuts, And CSS
entry.summary: The CSS Color Module Level 4 specification defined a slew of new color features when it became a candidate recommendation in 2022, including Oklab and Oklch, which have widened the field of color we have to work with. Explore the Oklch color space and how to start using it in CSS today.

entry.title: Earn a Free C# Certification from Microsoft and freeCodeCamp
entry.summary: I'm excited to announce that Microsoft and freeCodeCamp have teamed up to bring you a new free professional certification: the Foundational C# Certification. This professional certification includes 35 hours of training from Microsoft and an online certification exam by freeCodeCamp. By the end of this process, you'll have earned your
